mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CENTER_IMAGE( image_original_name, image_type, image_data, notice_id ) VALUES ( #{imageOriginalName}, #{imageType}, #{imageData}, #{noticeId} )
mapper.select: SELECT image_original_name, image_type, image_data, notice_id FROM CENTER_IMAGE WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND image_original_name = #{imageOriginalName}
